name: BCI Edge
desc: In order to bring BCI's website up to date with current web development standards, I recreated the site using NextJS allowing for easy expansion to any future developers.

name: CliqueBait
desc: A Full-stack social media aggregator for the Android platform. This was created for my Senior Capstone at MSU Denver over the course of 1 semester.

name: Expert System
desc: This Expert System asks for the user's Meyers-Brigg's personality type and then recommmends a TV show based on the given results.

name: Functional Sudoku Solver
desc: When given a textfile containing an unsolved sudoku puzzle, this program solves the puzzle using only functional programming practices.

name: My Environment
desc: All of my main dotfiles for environment configuration including neovim, tmux, and fish. Posted version is meant for reference and backups if needed.

name: stilianb.github.io
desc: A NextJS webapp using TailwindCSS and the Catppuccin color scheme.
